title: Product Bundle Schema
description: Defines a virtual product bundle that groups multiple individual product variants (components). The availability of a bundle is dynamically calculated based on the stock of its components.

id.description: The unique identifier for the bundle product variant. Follows the YSH global SKU pattern.

name.description: Descriptive name for the bundle, e.g., 'Kit Residencial 5.4 kWp - Jinko + Growatt'.

metadata.description: Metadata containing the core bundle logic.

is_bundle.description: Flag to identify this product as a bundle.

bundle_price_strategy.description: Strategy to calculate the bundle's price.

bundle_margin_percentage.description: Optional margin to apply if using 'sum_of_components' strategy.

bundle_components.description: An array of components that make up the bundle.

variant_sku.description: The global YSH SKU of the component's product variant.

quantity.description: The quantity of this component required for the bundle.

price_brl.description: The final price of the bundle in BRL. Can be fixed or dynamically calculated.

kpis.description: Dynamically calculated Key Performance Indicators for the bundle.
